API¶

yweather.WOEID_LOOKUP_URL¶

The URL used to fetch a location’s corresponding WOEID.

class yweather.Client[source]¶

Interface with the Yahoo! Weather RSS feed. Provides methods to search for location data and fetch weather data.

fetch_woeid(location)[source]¶

Fetch a location’s corresponding WOEID.

Parameters:

location (string) – a location (e.g. 23454 or Berlin, Germany).
Returns:

a string containing the requested WOEID or None if the WOEID could not be found.
Raises:
  • urllib.error.URLError – urllib.request could not open the URL (Python 3).
  • urllib2.URLError – urllib2 could not open the URL (Python 2).
  • xml.etree.ElementTree.ParseError – xml.etree.ElementTree could not open the URL.
